guipi

Class guiPiclass

  • java.lang.Object
    • guipi.guiPiclass

  • public class guiPiclass
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class to set up every method that is going to run in the GUI PI.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double pi 
      double usernumber 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      guiPiclass(double c)
      Set c to equal to usernumber from method of setnum().

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getpi()
      Method to return the number the user entered in the program.
      void setnum(double c)
      Same as the other code set c to equal to usernumber.
      double showpi(double usernumber)
      Main method to show the answer for the infinite series.

      • showpi

        public double showpi(double usernumber)
        Main method to show the answer for the infinite series. Starts with f= 1 then initializes term to zero. Goes through the loop till the last term of usernumber. uses the calculation to return term.
        Parameters:
        usernumber -
        Returns:
